arts.ttl: Lazio puts embarrassing week behind it with a dominant 3-0 win at Verona in Serie A
arts.sum: Lazio had started 2025 with a loss in the derby against Roma and then drew at home to relegation-threatened Como last weekend. Verona — which was bought by American firm Presidio Investors on Wednesday — remained in the relegation zone, level on points with 17th-placed Como.

arts.ttl: Lazio Fly High as Mattia Zaccagni Returns To Haunt Hellas Verona
arts.sum: Lazio made short work of their hosts Hellas Verona, beating them by three unanswered goals at the Bentegodi Stadium. arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 0-3 Lazio: Match Report
arts.sum: Lazio returned to winning ways with a commanding 3-0 victory against Hellas Verona at the Bentegodi Stadium, marking a significant turnaround for the team after a challenging start to 2025. The post Serie A | Verona 0-3 Lazio: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.sum: Lazio could be slapped with a big blow as Patric could miss the remainder of the season with an ankle injury. Ankle Injury The 32-year-old has been out since the start of the new year.
